document.query: UPDATE system_settings SET reference = 'tetherUSD' WHERE name = 'bcExternalCompanyPoolAddress';

INSERT INTO `system_settings` (`id`, `name`, `value`, `type`, `reference`, `description`, `module`) VALUES (NULL, 'bcExternalCompanyPoolAddress', '', '', 'tronUSDT', 'Blockchain external company pool address', 'TheNux');
